oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Weatherhouse - 1947-12-06 - Excerpts
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Excerpts from a Weatherhouse sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment (10:15-10:30 pm) from December 6, 1947. Featuring David Cobb (host), and performers Roy Acuff and his Smoky Mountain Boys, Bashful Brother Oswald, DeFord Bailey, and Tommy Jackson. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Roy Acuff; Smoky Mountain Boys; Bashful Brother Oswald; DeFord Bailey; Tommy Jackson
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: David Cobb introduces Roy Acuff -- A Pair Of Broken Hearts (Roy Acuff and his Smoky Mountain Boys) -- David Cobb introduces Bashful Brother Oswald -- I'll Be Your Sunshine (Bashful Brother Oswald) -- Weatherhouse commercial (David Cobb) (incomplete) -- [break] -- Roy Acuff introduces DeFord Bailey -- Kansas City Blues (DeFord Bailey) -- David Cobb introduces Roy Acuff -- Roy Acuff reads poem Life's A Funny Proposition After All -- Weatherhouse commercial (David Cobb) -- Turkey In The Straw (Tommy Jackson fiddle) -- Closing statement (David Cobb) (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Grand ole opry (Radio program); Acuff, Roy; Smoky Mountain Boys; Bashful Brother Oswald; Bailey, DeFord; Jackson, Tommy; Cobb, David (Announcer);
